entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, New Tecumseth
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Overcast. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Overcast. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
